mapper.insert: insert into boards (title, contents, user_nickname, division, create_time) values (#{title}, #{contents}, #{userNickName}, #{division}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select id, title, contents, user_nickname, division, hits, comments_cnt, create_time, modify_time, delete_time from boards where id = #{id} and delete_time is null
select id, title, contents, user_nickname, division, hits, comments_cnt, create_time, modify_time, delete_time from boards where user_nickname = #{nickName} and delete_time is null
select id, title, contents, user_nickname, division, hits, comments_cnt, create_time, modify_time, delete_time from boards where delete_time is null order by hits DESC
select id, title, contents, user_nickname, division, hits, comments_cnt, create_time, modify_time, delete_time from boards where delete_time is null and hits > 50 order by hits DESC
select id, title, contents, user_nickname, division, hits, comments_cnt, create_time, modify_time, delete_time from boards where division = '여행' and delete_time is null order by id DESC
